name: Midas Miner
description: Midas Miner is the No.1 Gold mining game on Binance Smart Chain. You can dig a lot of exclusive rewards in this game. With extremely special features to help players join the game easily as well as find a huge source of profit from the game. Like Midas's hand, every place gamers touch, gold will be spawned. Midas Miner is a miner-to-earn decentralized NFTGameFi where everyone can earn tokens through mining gold and diamonds, collecting NFT items, and training characters to sell on the marketplace
